Reviews.Content: GREAT CAMERA, I LIKE A CAMERA THAT IS EASY TO USE. THIS ONE  WAS GREAT AND I LOVED THE TOUCH SCREEN. WHY THEY DON'T PUT ON ALL MODELS I NOT UNDERSTAND. NEVER HAD ANY PROBLEMS. WILL BUY ANOTHER AS SOON ASI GET BACK TO STATES. I WAS RELIEVED OF MINE ON THE OVER CROWDED TRAINS IN THE PHILIPPINES.AT LEAST THEY DIDN'T GET THE CHARGER.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix 5400 12 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Leslie L Prorok
Reviews.Content: Pink way cool. Neat camera to fit in your purse when you can't care your larger digital. Great deal too.

Reviews.Title: Like the reviews said - nice features, so-so pictures
Reviews.Author: R. Dolesh
Reviews.Content: I have had previous versions of Nikon cameras and have overall been satisfied.  This one I sent back.  I took some family pictures in "moderate"  lighting (daytime inside but needed a flash).  When I reviewed the pictures I noticed a "stain" on my wife's shirt.  Looking further I noticed an "acid" spot on top of the dog's head.  My son's shirt also had "water marks".  I then looked at other pictures and the "spots" were not in the same positions - basically random spots and a function of the software.  I had to photoshop the pictures to make them look good.  This is unacceptable.Never even tried the movie mode or other settings.  Can't have a camera that is only for outdoor/daytime shots and outdoor/daytime movies.

Reviews.Title: LOVE EVERYTHING ABOUT THIS CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Donna Fernandez
Reviews.Content: Great little camera for the price and super easy to use.  I recently sold my Cannon digital SLR on craigslist because it was just so big and bulky and to complicated to use.  This camera takes just as good pics and video and with the touch screen it is to easy and simple to use.  The size is perfect so that I can carry it in my purse and have it with me at all times when that perfect pic or video opportunity should arise

Reviews.Title: happy with this camera
Reviews.Author: mstonefisk
Reviews.Content: I had an older version of the coolpix, and decided to purchase this one with my stepdaughter. we're very happy with it, looks beautiful & works great!

Reviews.Title: Resistive??LOVE IT.
Reviews.Author: Amit Biswas "Kumar"
Reviews.Content: You know when I saw the resistive screen on this, I thought for a while and then just literally bought this thing after 20 secs. Why cause of the resistive screen. When i got it I was like WHOA. IT takes great low light pics, better than my cousins canon s210is worth 300bucks. I got this for 129. And like my cousins it also does HD. HD is not as good as the canon, but the sound quality was superior to canon and overall a better HD experience. Unlike canon tho screen is not as good. Because of the resistive layer on top of the screen it looks a little weird at first but negligible after 2 minutes of use.Picture quality is good as expected. I dont use zoom and probably never will because Im a professional amature photographer. Contradictory I know, but I make the best use of my technology no matter it is. And one of the basic rules is no zoom for photography. Blurry images were nonexistent. Overall I love the camera.

Reviews.Title: So Much Fun!!!
Reviews.Author: JennyB
Reviews.Content: We bought this for my daughter's 16th Birthday and she absolutely loves it.  It is small enough it fits in her pocket like her cellphone and she takes it everywhere.  She really likes that she can write on the pictures with the stylus and put in captions.  The touchscreen makes it very easy to use and takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: MissK
Reviews.Content: I really love this Camera.  It's easy to use and I like the touch panel.  The screen is big and easy to view.

Reviews.Title: Coolpix is def cool
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It takes great pics. It is sleek and stylish. I only have 1 complaint. I ordered the red one and it doesn't really look red, more like a magenta color. I got it in red so both my husband and I could use it, but I don't think my husband will want to carry it around since it sorta looks like a hot pink color, but I love it. very cool for me.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!! :)
Reviews.Author: Erron Elisabeth
Reviews.Content: This is a really nice and affordable camera.It was soo easy and simple to figure out how to work.The quality of the pictures are really nice.This is my first nikon and it doesn't dissappoint!

Reviews.Title: coolpix camera
Reviews.Author: DavS
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a gift to a friend and he loved it and uses it continually. It worked as desired and 'wowed' his family with it. Very happy with this camera in every way.

Reviews.Title: Super
Reviews.Author: ggiorgi
Reviews.Content: - - - It's very good and it was as described. If you buy you will not regret!  - - -

Reviews.Title: Daughter loves it
Reviews.Author: JFC "laptopuser"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 20yr old daughter as a birthday present.  She loves it!

Reviews.Title: It's good enough for me
Reviews.Author: William Daigle "Music Lover"
Reviews.Content: If you have a steady hand, you can set the Megapixels pretty high. But the higher the resolution, the more likely it comes out blurry. If you use a tripod and the timer, the pics come out real good. But for every day photography, 3 megapixel shooting is very very clear. And they don't take up a lot of space on the card. Overall, I like it for the price.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S4000 Plum Review
Reviews.Author: Tanya C. Wright
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THIS CAMERA!!! It's So Petite And It Takes Crystal Clear Pics! I Was Debating Whether To Get The Silver or Plum One And I'm Glad I Got The Plum One, It Looks Very Feminine. The One Thing That I Didn't Really Like Is The User Manual, That It's On CD. Oh Well, I Guess You Can Print Out, Right? But It's Something Like 136 Pages or Something Like That To Print Out. I'm Going To Have To Buy Another Printer Cartridge To Be Able To Print The Whole Manual Out. Well, I Was Ecstatic When My Camera Arrived (Amazon Is The Fastest!!! :) The Second Box That The Camera Came In (The Nikon Coolpix S4000 Box) Was Just Gorgeous And I Just Had A Feeling This Was Going To Be Very Nice! I Pretty Much Understood Everything Except The Audio/Video Cable. I Didn't Know What This Was For. Anyway, I Hooked Up My Camera To Be Charged For The First Time And Everything Went Great (I Was Worried I Might Not Do It Right Since The Directions Are Mixed Up But I Understood Them Anyway. So, My Review of This Camera Is Definitely A Positive One, I'm Glad I Decided To Get This Camera That Stuck On Me Since Day One! (lol). Definitely Highly Recommended!

Reviews.Title: very dissapointing
Reviews.Author: mmd
Reviews.Content: i bought this camera brand new at the store for 130.00. takes really good pics so i was impressed at first but that did not last. a couple weeks after having it, the zoom quit working. i didn't have the receipt so i decided to not make a big deal about it. then about a week later it really messed up. anytime id take a video, it would stop while i was recording and the screen would say lens error. and no, my videos wouldn't save after that anymore. i tried 3 different memory cards and it did the same with all. it also wouldn't save all the pics i took either. so the camera was basically useless. i never dropped it, got it wet or even used it much. i sent it to the manufacturer last week and have yet to hear back. i bought a canon and i am very impressed with it.

Reviews.Title: Broken
Reviews.Author: K
Reviews.Content: Five minutes after taking it out of the box, I shut it off, and when I tried to turn it back on it said "lens error". If this product was brand new there's no reason why there should have been a lens error unless I touched the lens or dropped the camera. Which I didn't do. Verrrry disappointed, I don't actually believe that this camera was "brand new" like it said.

Reviews.Title: Slow. Therefore, useless (for me).
Reviews.Author: A. pacheco "How can you pluralize 'The Lone R...
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace my Canon SD870 IS. Long story short, I'm pretty satisfied with the pictures it takes, when it actually shoots what I'm looking at. I like all the bells and whistles, as well as the 720p video capability. However, when it comes to using the 'button halfway down' trick, forget about it. It takes any where from at least 2 seconds to what feels like an eternity to actually snap the picture... when the stupid face frame doesn't decide to pop up. After which, pressing the button all the way does nothing but make you want to spike the camera into the ground. I understand the nature of point and shoot cameras, but this was seldom an issue with the Canon. I almost NEVER missed the action shot I was going for with my 2 year old. This thing... garbage. I have a collection of test photos that consist of around 70% half-open eye lids.If you're looking to take pictures of scenery, or bowls of fruit, I'd recommend this. If you're looking for something you can keep in your pocket on standby for when the kids are doing something cool, look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Not happy with this camera
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: This camera had battery problems a few days out of the 60 day warranty.  I sent it to Nikon after buying a new battery and it still didn't work.  They sent it back to me saying nothing was wrong with it.  I got the camera back and it wasn't working, which was very frustrating.  Finally after sending it back to Nikon it was "fixed."  I was so unhappy in dealing with Nikon that I will be very cautious of ever buying a Nikon camera again.  The screen also shattered in my purse and now I am unable to view any pictures or delete.

Reviews.Title: frustrated with this camera
Reviews.Author: Anon9998
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera in August 2010.  My wife took pictures of me graduating from Army basic training and almost all of them were blurry.  I have now had a few months to take pictures and attempt to move them to my computer.  The camera has some kind of firmware issue.  Some pics suddenly become unreadable and lock up the camera.  It just sits there as if it is trying to move the file but it doesn't move it.  If you click cancel, it says "processing" indefinitely.  I have had to Ctl/Alt/Del and shut the process down like 10 times at least in the last four months.  I do NOT recommend this camera to anyone.  We bought it from W A L M A R T.  I wish I would have spent some time learning to hate it before I went to basic training so I could have taken it back.

Reviews.Title: kept blowing batteries
Reviews.Author: Charlotte
Reviews.Content: This camera was fine while it lasted. I purchased it for a trip to Europe in December. Despite no damage I am aware of, the camera blew two new batteries within 2 months before I gave up on it. This was probably just an electrical quirk of the camera I bought, but for $100 I decided to stop pursuing the issue and just purchased a Canon for our next trip. The pictures were fine, but I won't buy another Coolpix after that experience.

Reviews.Title: awful camera  out of focus and lense sticks
Reviews.Author: steve "bard4hire"
Reviews.Content: Pas on this one, why there would be good reviews. Out of 10 pics 7 are always out of focus. The settings are terrible. The lenses constantly sticks or gets stick. Very disappointing camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera!  I wasn't sure if I would but I really like the LCD touch screen.  The kids think it's great adding mustaches and writing on the pictures.  The price was very reasonable for what you get!  Only negative is the zoom lens is out when reviewing pictures so you can't lay it face down.

Reviews.Title: Won't go with Nikon ever again
Reviews.Author: Little momma of 2
Reviews.Content: I was pretty disappointed with my Nikon camera.  I had issues that I had to contact the service & support team through Nikon and found the agents to be extremely rude and did not help at all.  I will not buy from a company that can not show good customer service.

Reviews.Title: NIKON DIGITAL CAMERA
Reviews.Author: bobaluch
Reviews.Content: I AM NOT A CAMERA WHIZ BANG (THAT'S WHY I BOUGHT THIS AUTOMATIC CAMERA)SO I APOLOGIZE IF MY WORDING IS NOT ABSOLUTELY CAMERA PERFECT. THIS IS AN AWESOME CAMERA, IT IS SMALL, FITS NICE IN THE PANTS POCKET WITH MY LANCE CRACKERS, AND IT IS SIMPLE TO USE, GIVES LOTS OF FOND MEMORIES!! EASY TO BRING UP PAST PHOTOS WHETHER TO REVIEW, SHARE OR CRITIQUE. LOVE THE TOUCH SCREEN!! WHILE THIS IS NOT THE LATEST/GREATEST/BIGGEST PIXEL, ETC (THAT'S LIKELY WHY IT IS ON AMAZON) BUT IT IS SO MUCH MORE THAN MY LAST CAMERA I HAD TO WRITE TO TELL YOU. ALSO, THE EXTRA BATTERIES ARE VERY INEXPENSIVE, I BOUGHT SEVERAL. DON'T HESITATE WITH THIS ONE, NIKON QUALITY, SIMPLE, FUN EVEN!

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Laurelle Smith
Reviews.Content: My camera arrived in a few days.  Packaging perfect.  The pictures are excellent for a camera this price.

Reviews.Title: Crappy Camera
Reviews.Author: NKW
Reviews.Content: I take a lot of pictures, and after my last Coolpix died, I replaced it with this.  It sucks.  It's not usable.  The picture quality it terrible.  Only one out of ten shots isn't blurry - and I've tried adjusting everything.  The pictures just are not clear no matter what I do.  Add to that the fact that I had to warranty the first one after a month or two because the lens stopped working, and now the battery won't keep a charge...  My three year old cell phone takes better pictures and is more reliable.  Oh, and the video on this camera never worked for me.  Garbage.

Reviews.Title: Coolpix S4000 has faulty electronics
Reviews.Author: jim bene
Reviews.Content: I bought one based on Nikon "reputation" and was at first pleased with it. A few months later got one for my wife from a different source. Gradually quirks developed in both despite low usage of these cameras. They would not charge, lost charge quickly, would not turn on, would not turn off. Nightmare. Based on online "tips" we learned to simultaneously press both "on" button and "shutter" bottom to turn the things on and by our own experments found to briefly disconnect the battery to turn these faulty products off. Nikon told me "tough luck" when I attempted to get some help from them after the warranty was expired. No more Nikon products for me on my wife.Jim B.

Reviews.Title: Battery Won't Stay Charged
Reviews.Author: N. Hornsby
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for a year and I loved it.  Then the battery died.  I recharged it and it died in a day of NO use.  So, I bought a new battery and had the same problem.  I turned off the automatic charge by computer and that seemed to help...now it only dies in two days of non use instead of one!  I did not have this problem for a year and now I do.  I now HATE this camera.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed!
Reviews.Author: Boris
Reviews.Content: Bought this photo camera for my friend.It comes with broken matrix!Matrix has dead vertical line (not on display!)It's not funny really!

Reviews.Title: Very Very Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Irate
Reviews.Content: It was a huge disappointment and waste of money.  From the very first time I turned it on, the lens kept closing abruptly.  I initially thought the camera needed charging properly but as time went by, the same issue continued.  Some times it stay on for me to take a picture, other times it does not.When I did found someone to return the item to the states (I am not from the US and so it was an international purchase), the seller indicated that the warranty expired and there was nothing they could do.

Reviews.Title: Most shots were underexposed
Reviews.Author: Ralph Steadman "trikeboss"
Reviews.Content: Always had good luck with Canon Powershots, but decided to give a Nikon P&S; a try.Out of the first fifty test shots well over half the pics were underexposed or otherwise messed up.Very disappointing performance that makes me wonder whether a recent Nikon D5000 purchase without considering a Canon DSLR was a wise move.Returned for a Canon PowerShot ELPH 300 HS 12.1 MP Digital Camera (Black) that produced great pic after great pic during a two week vacation.

Reviews.Title: Sucky Product
Reviews.Author: mope3rd
Reviews.Content: the worst camera i ever owned - hard to operate - very light weight - bad pictures - very disapointed in nikon - going back to kodak ugh

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: bp95
Reviews.Content: I've had this product for about a month now & LOVE it! it takes beautiful pictures,so many modes to choose from,and the touch screen is very responsive. The only complaint is that the time it takes to reload after taking one picture to take another is a little long but other than that its great esp. for the price! I haven't used it for videos yet but judging by the picture quality I'm sure it will be good! if your looking for a quality camera but not for the "quality camera price" pick this one up.you wont regret it

Reviews.Title: I love my camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Vettsy
Reviews.Content: My husband gave this camera to me as a gift, and I LOVE IT!!! It's soo super easy to use and the photos come out great!!! I would highly recommend it to family & friends!!!!

Reviews.Title: Amazon, pls fix the dimensions
Reviews.Author: Nestor
Reviews.Content: I wanted to buy a small camera for my husband.  The product dimensions listed are 4 x 7 x 6 inches.  This was way too big.  I finally called a camera shop and asked what the dimensions are.  They said 3 x 2 inches (approx,). I bought the camera.  Amazon please correct your dimensions. We haven't taken a lot of pics yet but so far we like the camera. I just got frustrated with the wrong size.

Reviews.Title: S4000
Reviews.Author: Bruce
Reviews.Content: Overall,I am happy with the camera however i would be allot happier if Nikon provided a hard copy of the user manual.Learning to use the camera with a CD disc is time consuming and inconvenient therefore insuring i will probably never know how to use all the bells and whistles

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S4000 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: pampered
Reviews.Content: I would order from Ritz again... I couldn't believe the fast delivery,I received it the next day.... That was amazing... The price wascompatible with stores and I didn't have to go anywhere to purchase it..And this was one of the few company's to have the color i needed.

Reviews.Title: It was a gift.
Reviews.Author: Rocky Xiong
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my girlfriend and she really liked it. I touched it a bit and it's really nice. I really like the features on the camera and it's user friendly, at least to me.

Reviews.Title: bad seller bad quality
Reviews.Author: Suh F. Ng
Reviews.Content: I tried it when I first received the camera. but found out the camera totally not working after 30 days.  Not able to get refund at all.  I have to trash it and wasted all my money.

Reviews.Title: Camera is not very intuitive
Reviews.Author: Lucille Zimmerman
Reviews.Content: Even though this is my second Nikon Coolpix camera I don't like it. Someone took the first one out of my person and I bought another one just like it because I had invested so much time learning how to work it. I assumed all digital cameras were difficult to use. Now I wish I would have bought a Sony.The pictures are decent, but the camera is not intuitive. If I want anything other than a regular shot I have to spend several minutes pushing buttons and it is usually a matter of luck if I get to where I want. I just randomly move about until I see something that might work. It you want an easy, intuitive camera, got for a Sony Cyber-shot.One of the nice features about this camera is that it has the feature that I call "beauty" - it softens and edits blotch blemishes on faces. It lets you do it subtly or intensely. My daughter doesn't like this feature because she says it makes peoples' faces look fat. Another nice feature is that the camera picks up people's faces and automatically focuses on them.I'm sure this would be a wonderful camera, and has lots of great options like self-timer, fireworks, low light, beach light, indoors, mountain scenes, flowers, etc, but I can't ever figure out how to get to them at the moment I need those things. I don't want to spend hours and hours reading a manual.

Reviews.Title: Good thing it's only a temp camera
Reviews.Author: B. Luna "lvnjamesnbrooke"
Reviews.Content: I just recently sold my Canon Camera to get a DSLR camera... though I sold it to a friend as a Christmas gift and I was without a camera. So I went to the store to buy one expecting it to be just a "diaper bag camera" just for those moments. The Big test was obviously Christmas morning. My touchscreen has many delays,as well as i almost feel like I am gonna break the screen because I have to push rather hard to get it to recognize I'm touching it! the picture quality.. it could do much better, the flash doesn't seem to be big enough I am glad the stores are open sunday so I can return it... I would not recommend this to anyone unless it was maybe a foe :).I will say the only thing that I did like about it.. It was very sleek and slim.. could fit right in my bra ha ha. and it had a big screen

Reviews.Title: Thumbs up!
Reviews.Author: leinani45 "...:auntykaryn:..."
Reviews.Content: Great point and shoot for photogs of any experience level. Particularly love the touch screen. Surprisingly easy to use--seeing as I have large fingers. :) Great quality photos and cool features. However, i would have preferred to have a stabilizer for zoomed in shots.

Reviews.Title: Average Quality Photos
Reviews.Author: Matthew Crawford
Reviews.Content: This is a decent camera for the average user but it doesn't perform nearly as well as my old Canon SD750 or my Canon SD880.I was expecting an upgrade but instead I got a major downgrade in quality and features.This camera only has two timer modes Single shot 10s and single shot 2s where my Canon cameras have 4 including custom preset timers with Multiple shots in one setting.Macro mode is more than useless and doesn't perform well at all.Video on this camera is ok but the video is really choppy, laggy and doesn't look very high def at all.The images taken with this camera are not very clear and are very grainy at best. I only see this camera useful if you want to spend hours with photoshop to touch up each photo before you can even share it with your friends and family.I am sending this camera back for a refund and going to buy a Canon DSLR instead.

Reviews.Title: Horrible video time(s)
Reviews.Author: c0yotef4n81
Reviews.Content: Takes decent pics. and OK video shots but limits the time available to each shooting mode, regardless of SD/SDHC card size, as such: HD 720p @ 12m33s; TV movie 640 @ 25m 8s & Small size 320 @ 29m 0s.  I've tried the 2gb card it came with, an 8gb PNY Optima SDHC 120 HD (Best Buy @ $[...]), and a 16gb Polaroid (by PNY) Micro SD (with adapter) (Fry's @ $[...] after rebate) with no difference in recording times.  Yeah, it'll allow multiple recordings but you'd have to join them together on your PC.  I would not recommend this unless you only had [...] to spend.

Reviews.Title: Not crazy about this camera yet.
Reviews.Author: Linda J. Flickinger "celtictrek"
Reviews.Content: It's slow!  Maybe I'm missing something, but it takes forever from the time I press the button till it actually takes the picture.  When you're photographing a 9-month old, that just doesn't work out!  I'm going to give it another week or 2, then I'm going to see if it can be returned, even though I no longer have the packaging.

Reviews.Title: Fun but low quality pictures
Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: I have a slr but I wanted a camera that was more compact and something I could take everywhere.  I wasn't expecting top of the line but the pics were very low quality.  I wanted to love the camera because of all the features but almost every picture turned out bad.  The videos turned out horrible to and looked nothing like hd.  I returned the product for a new cannon.

Reviews.Title: this product is used scratches all over
Reviews.Author: upset customer
Reviews.Content: i am very disappointed this product is used lots of scratches screen messed up its a rip off.i bought this item as a present but i am embarrassed to give a used product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Is this a nikon?
Reviews.Author: P. C. Paladin
Reviews.Content: I dont know much about digital cameras, but i thought that this was going to be a good camera. Bad performance and dont talk about video, this is the worst thing about the camera.i dont recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Subpar Point-and-Shoot
Reviews.Author: T. Wilkerson "Curly Hair Guru"
Reviews.Content: This camera is horrible! Macro mode was laughable. The white balance made everything the same color. Sharpness of the photos was lacking. I will be going back to Canon cameras because they never fail to deliver.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: A
Reviews.Content: Wonderful camera, so small but so good, had an earlier model which I lost while on vacation, this one is so much better, the quality of the photos is really good for such a small camera, very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix
Reviews.Author: bobbie'sbuyingagain
Reviews.Content: Already own an Olympus digital camera, but this camera takes much better, clearer pictures.  Easy to use, not clumsey.Very portable.  I have the hard-shell case for it and it protects camera extremely well!

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: bgrdtongue
Reviews.Content: Great Camera, Good Price.... Beats waiting in the snow on black friday........ kind of hard to use the touch screen without using the stylus which is included... Overall very satisfied

Reviews.Title: a winner with my daughter-in-law
Reviews.Author: Nanab
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter-in-law.  She researched and had determined that this was the one that was the most "bang for the buck".  She is thrilled with it.

Reviews.Title: I love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my best friend for Christmas and he LOVES it!!!! The camera is really small and compact making it very easy to carry around. He was really impressed with the touch screen function and the quality of pictures (even in bad lighting) is sooooo bright and clear. This is an excellent camera for the average person who doesn't know much about photography and is looking for something small, and simple that takes really great quality pics!!

Reviews.Title: Double the price if you want to edit
Reviews.Author: J. Hilton-Simmons
Reviews.Content: We are returning this camera.  Perhaps I am doing something wrong, but I want a camera I can just set to auto mode and not have to worry about fussing with settings for different pictures.  So I took this out of the box and started shooting.  I just downloaded the pictures for the first time...and they are very blurry.  I thought no worries, I'll take care of this in editing.  Well, I couldn't figure out how to edit, I called Nikon and they informed me that I have to purchase NX2 editing software separate from the camera to get red eye, crop, and auto adjust editing.  The cost of the software is $180!!!  That's the price I paid for the camera!  Are they serious?  For someone who is in the $200 market, I will find another camera for $200 that includes the editing software.  Good grief!  They did inform me that the camera has red eye settings, etc. that I can adjust up front.  But again...I want a camera I can set to auto and not worry about settings.  I am most concerned that the quality came out very poor.  We had purchased a Canon 3100IS prior to this, the picture quality was great and the editing software came with it included in price of camera...we returned it only because it seemed slow to take pictures.  This Nikon isn't really much of an improvement as far as response time...and given the quality and editing issues, we will be returning this and probably re-purchasing the Canon.  Ugh!The reason I give it 2 stars vs 1 star is because the touch screen feature is very cool, my husband is a big guy, with large hands/fingers, so it's easy for him to navigate vs using the tiny buttons on the other cameras.

Reviews.Title: Keep looking!
Reviews.Author: Gymfreak
Reviews.Content: I do not like this camera at all. The manual is only on a cd. The photo quality sucks. It takes horrible pic at night no matter what scene setting you put it on. NOT user friendly at all. I will never get another Nikon.  My kodak and samsung were so much easier to operate.  Also the program for downloading is very complicated.  Hate it!

Reviews.Title: pice of junk!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Miro Addison IL
Reviews.Content: I took few pictures and  camera stop works  with the lens extended. This is pice of junk. Do not buy it!!!

Reviews.Title: I'm going back to canon
Reviews.Author: Mac Fan
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for one month and it will not charge. Customer service has been little to no help. I sent it into Nikon service and received it back with NO service report. I have no clue what they did to the camera or if anything is wrong. IT STILL IS NOT WORKING. So now what do I do? Buy 40-60 worth of batteries and cords that had no reason to fail this quickly. These are not covered by the Nikon warranty. I AM NOT HAPPY WITH THIS CAMERA!!!!! I WILL NEVER BUY ANOTHER NIKON EVER AGAIN AND I WAS LOOKING TO REPLACE MY DSLR XTi BUT NOW I KNOW IT WILL BE REPLACED WITH ANOTHER CANON!!!! I will also be going back to canon for my point and click. I don't know why I even decided to change when I have never had any of my Canons fail like this. I would have given it a zero star if i could have. In this day and age with the economy, every dollar I spend is valuable and I wasted it on this pile and there are NO second chances!

Reviews.Title: Not a good camera to use out of box
Reviews.Author: Student in AZ
Reviews.Content: This camera was difficult to use. I am somewhat familiar with cameras. My other camera is a Nikon D60. I was expecting a camera that was small enough to fit in my pocket and easy enough that I wouldnt have to read a 100 page manual to figure it out. Well, I was wrong! This is definately not a camera that you can pull out of the box and use right away. The settings are difficult to understand. The manual comes on CD so you have to have your laptop ready to figure out how to get it going. I cant even get the flash to stay on. Every single picture I have taken is blurry and its not me. The shutter seems to go so slow that the kids moved and all of their pictures were blurry. I tried different scene settings and that didnt seem to help. I am extremely dissapointed. Even my husband is having trouble figuring out the BASICS. I am sure if your primary goail is a touch screen then this is for you but dont expect to get it up and running without some serious studying. A real disappointment.

Reviews.Title: Nikon - never again
Reviews.Author: Robert B Franke
Reviews.Content: The camera refuses to function. Although I was able to register it and set up an account, I have repeatedly been unable to submit a request for support.The camera stops with the lens extended. At first it would return if I left it lay for some period of time, but it has been extended for over a month - totally useless!Nikon did send me an email offering to sell me another camera at $20 less than I paid for the non-functioning unit.As I read it, the only recourse I have is to ship the unit to California - and pay a fee if they can't find anything wrong. I will not spend a single dime more for the camera!!!!

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Wise Guy
Reviews.Content: I was watching two cameras. Fuji FinePix F300EXR and Nikon Coolpix 8100.I read a lot reviews and specs. Made online searches. It seems these two have both cons and pros. Could not decide.I went to best buy to touch and benchmark these. Still could not decide.Then, I found, […] vs-Nikon_Coolpix_S8100Was I lucky or what? Beautiful. They just did it for me. (I did not thank the reviewer though)So, I decided to buy a Nikon S8100, It seems, I did the right choice, as I always do (not humble? may be).I have been using Nikon S8100 for several days. Very likable camera. Easy to handle. High def LCD is fancy. Nice dial and lots of functions. (You gotta read the manual for them). If you are lazy, then use auto function. For many cases, you will get good quality pictures. However, you might need to adjust your shooting conditions, if the scene is not suitable for auto mode.From previous feedbacks, several of them are poorly said and concluded. It seems they did not even the the manual. This camera has a lot of options (I mean a lot) and manual is 220 pages. So, read it. (It takes 2.5 hours to finish). Then you will have some idea how to shoot.Now,1. Feedback regarding "Poor low light condition", I took several pics in low light with auto mode and manual mode. They are both fine. Image stabilization helps a lot. So, read the manual. It tells how to shoot in low light.2. Feedback regarding "Continuous zoom noise in video mode", If you set your AF focus single mode rather than AF continuous, then it goes away. It is in the manual.3. Feedback regarding "battery", I took ~250 pics, It is still going. Manual says, once you first got the battery, charge it for 3.5 hours. That's what I did. I did not record long run movie though. This might be the case for video mode in high def mode.4. There is multi-function menu dial. I love it.5. You gotta get a additional memory card (I got 8 GB, it seems more than enough). Internal one is nothing.6. You can charge the camera via your computers USB. Love it.7. If you buy a leather carrying case for Nikon S series cameras, it does not fit. Make sure that you buy the leather case for S8100 and S8100 only.

Reviews.Title: Item returned and received full refund
Reviews.Author: Laxmendhar K Racha
Reviews.Content: The seller refunded the money after the item was returned. I would like to do business with the seller again.

Reviews.Title: still waiting for a product
Reviews.Author: Otto
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Nikon Coolpix digital camera before christmas and here it's after new years and still no camera...  not happy...  maybe should have used another site for better service....

Reviews.Title: 4 months old and fatal lens error
Reviews.Author: Giz Mo Zart
Reviews.Content: After 4 months this little piece of junk turned into a paper weight.  The lens mech is cheap and now all I get is a lens error and the camera is non operative.  I'll never own another Nikon again!!  Do not buy this camera!!

Reviews.Title: Terrible Prodcut!
Reviews.Author: moo133
Reviews.Content: My camera broke a little after a month of buying it.  I sent it to the Nikon Service Dept for repairs and they've had the camera for a month and a half (longer than I actually had the camera!)  Terrible service, terrible product-- stick with a casio!

Reviews.Title: Grate
Reviews.Author: Irma Solorzano
Reviews.Content: This is a grate CAMERA  for the money easy to use compact good touch screen just love it

Reviews.Title: Wrong camera color
Reviews.Author: A. Marculano "ACorrade"
Reviews.Content: I bought a RED camera and got a Pink one. The biggest problem is that I am from Brazil and I have no way of returning it, shame!As for the camera, it takes very good quality pictures but I am really disappointed about the mistake.

Reviews.Title: Got plum not red camera
Reviews.Author: Linda Noland Aikins
Reviews.Content: Ordered red.  Came in box marked red. This camera is plum which is the only color i was sure I did NOT want. Had to go ahead and use it due to family get-together. Not happy.

Reviews.Title: Nonsense
Reviews.Author: Jayar "Jayar"
Reviews.Content: The Nikon S4000 is apparently a camera, which, in addition to being pretty much automatic, gives the user a host of options to experiment with the settings. I'll never know because Nikon DOES NOT supply the 190 page written manual with the camera, but rather a CD which the buyer can print themselves. I did take a few pictures before returning the camera to Amazon. I don't know if all cameras in this price range hold back on a written manual. As a replacement, I purchased the less expensive Nikon S570 at a closeout sale, which came with two 150+/- page written manuals, one in English and one in another language.When I called Nikon directly, I was informed they no longer supplied written manuals because of the added expense. Added expense ???.The Nikon consumer rep said they were saving me money by no longer supplying a printed manual with their cameras. Really? The manuals are printed in China on paper that is just a notch above bathroom tissue, so the cost of printing 200 pages, is what, 25 to 50 cents.  I'd be quite happy to fork over another dollar or two for a written manual that I could take along on trips.Nikon does include a 20 page QUICK START guide, which consistently refers to a page in the CD manual for more detailed information. So now if you want to try different settings at the beach, or the park, or anywhere else, bring your computer for suggestions and instructions.  I did look into printing the manual at Staples, but if would have cost about $20.00 (no discount for double sided printing).Because I find it easier to thumb thru pages, rather than scan a CD, I would not recommend this or any multi-function camera which does not include a real manual.

12.0 megapixels for stunning prints as large as 16 x 20 inches
Bright 3.0-inch touch-panel LCD; Sensitive Response Touch Panel; Touch Shutter and Autofocus
4x wide-angle Zoom-NIKKOR glass lens
720p HD movie recording at 24 fps
4-way VR Image Stabilization System; Smart Portrait System
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon Coolpix S4000 12 MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Vibration Reduction (VR) Zoom and 3.0-Inch Touch-Panel LCD (Pink)
